in.ac.iitb.cfilt.similarityapi.dictionary

Class Pointer

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.ac.iitb.cfilt.similarityapi.dictionary.Pointer

  • public class Pointer
extends java.lang.Object
    A Pointer encodes a lexical or semantic relationship between WordNet entities. A lexical relationship holds between Words; a semantic relationship holds between Synsets. Relationships are directional: the two roles of a relationship are the source and target. Relationships have a type: the type of a relationship is a PointerType, and can be retrieved via getType.

      • Pointer

        public Pointer(PointerTarget source,
       int index,
       PointerType pointerType,
       POS targetPOS,
       long targetOffset,
       int targetIndex,
       long srcOffset)
        Constructor for relations other than gradation and ontology nodes.
        Parameters:
        source - Source synset of type PointerTarget
        index - index of the source synset.
        pointerType - PointerType is the type of relation.
        targetPOS - POS of the target synset.
        targetOffset - offset of the word in the data_txt file
        targetIndex - index of the target word
